attributes.additional_details: After watching the euros tonight it highlighted the importance of CPR. It significantly increases the chance of a person's survival if good quality CPR is given straight away. I believe this should be taught in schools so everyone has basic knowledge how to perform CPR to potentially save lives.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory to teach children CPR in schools.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
